children.text:
0.4.14
- Fix a possible NullPointerException in EnterUserPassword.
- Add VIBRATE permission because app fails on some android 2.3.7 and 4.0.4 devices.
- Fix VerifyError on Android 1.5.
0.4.13
- Major refactoring of code base to prepare for a public service API, Android 4.0, alternative GUIs, etc.
- Now opens password dialog right away, when OpenVPN Settings is in front
- issue #150 Drop feature 'Run multiple daemons at a time' in favor for a simpler service API.
- issue #10 Remember password in the prompt.
0.4.12
- issue #135 /sbin/busybox is not detected
0.4.11
- Check prerequisites and tell user what is missing.
- Change license to GPLv3.
0.4.10
- issue #108 Username and password input fields are multi-line enabled.
- issue #115 Crash when more than 2GB data has been transfered.
- issue #70 Repeating notifications when connecting / connected.
- issue #112 	NPE in Shell.joinLoggers.
0.4.9
- issue #4 Display logging to user.
- issue #105 Add "--verb 3" to command line when launching a connection
- issue #41 Add a function to collect tun.ko modules
- issue #106 Add android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission to edit config files
0.4.8
- Make OpenVPN Settings available to more devices.
- Update launcher icon.
- issue #47 Tunnel typo in config description on main screen
- issue #103 	Enable small and large screen sizes
- Revert background to black. Change was unintentional.
0.4.7
- Display ads to support development. Ads may be turned of in advanced menu.
- issue #42 UnknownHostException: InetAddress.getLocalHost()
- issue #19: Allow configs to be stored in subdirectories.
- Show a 'restart required' dialog, after changes to config file or properties.
- Make the config name customizeable. - issue #35: Option to fix routing on new HTC Roms (Froyo). If this bug applys to you then choose Menu -> Advanced -> Fix HTC Routes.
- Fixed a force close when a tunnel was started before the first network connection was established (crash report via market).
0.4.6
- Spawn openvpn process in a different way to support more android mods
0.4.5
- issue #5: auth-user-pass with multiple tunnels fails randomly
- Fixed a 'Force close' when su is not available (crash report via market).
- Fixed a 'Force close' when openvpn binary is not installed (crash report via market).
0.4.4
- issue #17: Make path to tun.ko a configuration parameter
- issue #18: Fixed cannot allocate TUN/TAP dev dynamically
- issue #16: Fixed Occasional Force Close when saving client config file
- VPN DNS now defaults to 'No DNS server'
- Fixed an issue where a command sent to the shell could get lost
- Display change log when update is detected
0.4.3
Please view change sets in repository for this and earlier versions.
